name: Neil Degrasse Tyson Funks the Universe
description: While trying to find a job in a science-related field, I created this animation to include in my job hunt, which helped me get invited to the National Space Symposium, and attain a job in the very scientific field of legal visuals. I took Neil Degrasse Tyson's appearance from the Rogan Podcast, edited his words into lyrics that rhymed, and timed it to Wax Taylor. After I edited the lyrics into a song, I animated what it said, and it came out looking great.

name: The Age of Surprise
description: I wrote and produced this animation for the U.S. Air Force while working for Hangar 30, a digital services agency that specializes in apps, animations, websites, and visuals for military clients. An Air Force colonel wanted to show the future of combat in a presentation about cyberwarfare, and he needed a mind-blowing intro video to prime the audience. I wrote, animated and edited everything in one week. The video resulted in our company receiving contracts for similar videos for SOCOM, the Defense Intelligence Agency, and National Defense University.

name: The Space Report
description: I produced this animation for the Space Foundation to use in its marketing material to promote the 2015 Space Report, an annual report that details the overall space industry with in-depth analysis. The video was used throughout their online material, including the web portal to download the report, and the video was featured on about fifty screens throughout the 2015 Space Symposium. I was asked to repurpose the same video for them to use with the 2016 Space Report.

name: Defense Intelligence Agency
description: After producing the Age of Surprise video for the Air Force, the Defense Intelligence Agency wanted a similar animation that would help them simplify the complicated message of what the DIA does. I animated the intro section (first minute 1:40 of the video above) using an infographic style to build a crescendo of dark talking points the DIA wanted conveyed. Another artist animated the remainder of the video featuring high-intensity facts about the DIA with three-dimensional graphics.

name: The National Defense University
description: National Defense University needed a video for Hillary Clinton to introduce her before receiving the 2013 Patriot Award from NDU. I worked on both the writing of this script and animation of these transitions. The video was presented in at the ceremony in Washington, D.C., and we went on to produce a second video that would serve as a commercial explaining National Defense University's history, opportunities for students, and NDU's overall mission.

name: History of Facebook
description: I produced this animation for a freelance client to break down the history of Facebook. The Pandemic Tracker displays Covid-19 statistics across the globe. Try it for yourself and see what areas the world are experiencing the biggest impact from the pandemic. The Pandemic Tracker displays Covid-19 statistics across the globe.
